DOC.brief_summary: We believe extreme longevity is due to specific genes which function to delay aging and prevent disease. The purpose of our research is to identify the genes/mutations associated with healthier aging; to understand the biological functions of these genes/mutations; and to develop therapies to replicate these preservative genetic activities in individuals who do not have the genetic profile for longevity.
DOC.brief_title: The Longevity Genes in Founder Populations Project
DOC.criteria: Ashkenazi Jewish, age 95+, Offspring of person age 95+, Offspring of parents who died age 70 or younger. NonAshkenazis
